born: The born event is related to life and someone is given birth to.
marry: The marry event is related to life and someone is married.
divorce: The divorce event is related to life and someone was divorced.
injure: The injure event is related to life and someone is injured.
die: The die event is related to life and someone died.
transport: The transport event is related to movement. The event occurs when a weapon or vehicle is moved from one place to another.
transfer ownership: The transfer ownership event is related to transaction. The event occurs when an item or an organization is sold or gave to some other.
transfer money: The transfer money event is related to transaction. The event occurs when someone is giving, receiving, borrowing, or lending money.
start organization: The start organization event is related to a new organization being created.
merge organization: The merge organization event is related to two or more organization coming together to form a new organization.
declare bankruptcy: The declare bankruptcy event is related to some organization declaring bankruptcy.
end organization: The end organization event is related to some organization ceasing to exist.
attack: The attack event is related to conflict and some violent physical act.
demonstrate: The demonstrate event is related to a large number of people coming together to protest.
meet: The meet event is related to a group of people meeting and interacting with one another face-to-face.
phone write: The phone write event is related to people phone calling or messaging one another.
start position: The start position event is related to a person begins working for an organization or a hiring manager.
end position: The end position event is related to a person stops working for an organization or a hiring manager.
nominate: The nominate event is related to a person being nominated for a position.
elect: The elect event is related to a candidate wins an election.
arrest jail: The arrest jail event is related to a person getting arrested or a person being sent to jail.
release parole: The release parole event is related to an end to someone's custody in prison.
trial hearing: The trial hearing event is related to a trial or hearing for someone.
charge indict: The charge indict event is related to someone or some organization being accused of a crime.
sue: The sue event is related to a court proceeding that has been initiated and someone sue the other.
convict: The convict event is related to someone being found guilty of a crime.
sentence: The sentence event is related to someone being sentenced to punishment because of a crime.
fine: The fine event is related to someone being issued a financial punishment.
execute: The execute event is related to someone being executed to death.
extradite: The extradite event is related to justice. The event occurs when a person was extradited from one place to another place.
acquit: The acquit event is related to someone being acquitted.
appeal: The appeal event is related to someone appealing the decision of a court.
pardon: The pardon event is related to someone being pardoned.
